mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach (uuid, uploadPath, fileName, fileType, tableId, bno) values (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{tableId}, #{bno})
mapper.select: select uuid, uploadPath, fileName, fileType, tableId, bno from tbl_attach where tableId = #{TABLE_ID} and bno =#{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_attach where tableId = #{TABLE_ID} AND bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select uuid, uploadPath, fileName, fileType, tableId, bno from tbl_attach where uploadPath = date_format(date_add(now(),interval -1 day),'%Y\\%m\\%d')
